English_meaning: uprose. Means:: After Dilip,having heard the Ragu's eastablishing(as king) in the already smoke spread hearts of the other kings, fire started uprising. A stick smokes before it burns. Similarly in the hearts of other kings which were already, in Dilip's time, smoking , fire started uprising on hearing his(the Raghu's) establishing(as King) out of fear about his valiance .
